kickstart.post:
/sbin/ldconfig
ID=`/bin/egrep -i "^lmwriter" /etc/group` if [ "$ID" == "" ] ; then # adding lmwriter user /usr/sbin/useradd -c "Lifemapper user" lmwriter else # adding lmwriter user, group already exists (from lifemapper roll) /usr/sbin/useradd -c "Lifemapper user" -g lmwriter lmwriter fi
#!/bin/bash # do LM initializaton
/sbin/ldconfig /opt/lifemapper/rocks/bin/initLMcompute rm -rf /etc/rc.d/rocksconfig.d/post-99-lifemapper
